page.title: 16RECREATION Facilities
page.content: Burgess Hill is the centre of recreation for the countryside around, and for the town itself. There are numerous facilities on a small scale dotted around serving many different activities. Many of these facilities house clubs or organisations. At{St.John's Park}there is an indoor and an outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts, and childrens play areas with playground equipment. {Sidney West Sports Centre}is the home for several other sports clubs. The{Martlets Hall}is the centre for several non-sports clubs such as chess and philately. {Oakmeeds Community School}run night classes both there and at many other schools in the area. {Senior citizens}have a centre where many facilities for suitable leisure activities are available.
